We're thrilled to welcome you to the latest edition of our newsletter. This issue marks a significant milestone for BARBUSS as we celebrate a major step forward in our mission to be a collaborative partner for our clients.

In this edition, we dive into the details of our recent acquisition of HDI Seguros in Argentina and Uruguay.

We're thrilled to welcome you to the latest edition of our newsletter. 
View this email in your browser <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/BHlgCE6noUo519xIJc3s7zkwS?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>  	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/NFs2CGQpqSZ5WY4iEfMsBsrNJ?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
We're thrilled to welcome you to the latest edition of our newsletter. This issue marks a significant milestone for BARBUSS as we celebrate a major step forward in our mission to be a collaborative partner for our clients.

In this edition, we dive into the details of our recent acquisition of HDI Seguros in Argentina and Uruguay.

We're also proud to share a fascinating case study where we successfully defended an insurance client in a complex legal battle. This landmark victory not only protected our client from financial burden but also established a significant legal precedent. This story is a testament to our strategic approach and unwavering commitment to securing the best outcomes for those we serve.

In addition, this newsletter highlights our continued dedication to #ClosenessToClients. We'll recap a productive week of meetings in Mexico with clients and prospects, where we discussed their subrogation needs. We also had a strategic meeting in Brazil with Tokio Marine Seguradora.

You will also learn about the impactful workshops we have been conducting, such as the one with HDI Chile focused on successful recoveries and a recent Professional Civil Liability training session with La Segunda.

You will also learn about the impactful workshops we have been conducting, such as the one with HDI Chile focused on successful recoveries and a recent Professional Civil Liability training session with La Segunda.

We invite you to read on and explore the stories of growth, success, and partnership that define BARBUSS vision, to transform the risk industry.
 
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/4b6fdf14-d9bf-5a99-359b-ec41f82b0f16.png> 	

BARBUSS COMPLETES STRATEGIC DEAL


At BARBUSS, we have completed the acquisition of HDI Seguros' operations in Argentina and Uruguay. This decision aligns with our purpose of being collaborative with our clients to achieve common goals and our strategy of incorporating more acculturated talent.

Welcome, HDI Seguros Argentina and HDI Seguros Uruguay teams!

Access to Press Release <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/iUDRCJ7vwfLEprwI5hYsyqONp?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 
 
Back to index
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/c55684c6-4be5-c239-c4d6-94da96d984e7.jpg> 	

CASE STUDY - CHALLENGING THE DEDUCTIBLE

Access to Press Release <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/iUDRCJ7vwfLEprwI5hYsyqONp?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 
 
Back to index
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/c55684c6-4be5-c239-c4d6-94da96d984e7.jpg> 	

CASE STUDY - CHALLENGING THE DEDUCTIBLE


When faced with a policyholder unwilling to fulfill their contractual obligations, our client, a major insurance company, found itself in a challenging legal battle. This case study details how BARBUSS successfully defended the client’s interests, established a significant legal precedent, and ensured the client did not bear the financial burden.
 
Dive into the full story to learn how our strategic approach and unwavering commitment led to a landmark victory.
 
Full case here. <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/7oS7CK5wxUx58EWc7ixs5tg0I?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 


Back to index
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/XtKvCL5xyUMnNj9hos5syAvln?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/442a1026-9e34-e110-9ff7-56aef7185544.jpg> 	

AT LE RENDEZ-VOUS PARISMAT!

  
We had an incredibly valuable time at the 16th edition of Le Rendez-Vous ParisMAT!

It was a privilege for our team, Nathalie Pasqualino and Amaury Muller, to be present at this key event for the transport insurance industry.

We had an incredibly valuable time at the 16th edition of Le Rendez-Vous ParisMAT!

It was a privilege for our team, Nathalie Pasqualino and Amaury Muller, to be present at this key event for the transport insurance industry.

Our sincere thanks to the entire organizing team and the Comité d'Études et de Services des Assureurs Maritimes et Transports (CESAM) for putting together such a beneficial gathering.
 
Back to index
	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/f9740953-6805-b292-e994-1cd25efb9b3e.jpg> 	

A STRATEGIC MEETING

  
We had the honor of meeting with the Tokio Marine Seguradora team to share our integrated service proposal for the claims management of a major regional account in Latin America.

This meeting allowed us to reinforce what defines us: our unwavering commitment to specialized solutions, the technology that drives innovation, and the operational efficiency our clients deserve.

Many thanks to the Tokio Marine team for the excellent reception and the valuable conversations. We move forward with the clear goal of delivering value through a technical, agile, and truly global service.

Regional synergy, local excellence.
Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/b43d2261-3b00-490e-6b00-8bc9e8946613.jpg> 	

TRAINING WITH LA SEGUNDA SEGUROS

 
Our Buenos Aires team, led by our Country Manager Juan Manuel de la Vega and joined by Javier Garat (BA Liability Specialist) and Juan Ignacio Pesado, had the pleasure of visiting La Segunda Seguros.

Our Buenos Aires team, led by our Country Manager Juan Manuel de la Vega and joined by Javier Garat (BA Liability Specialist) and Juan Ignacio Pesado, had the pleasure of visiting La Segunda Seguros.

We conducted a comprehensive training session on Professional Civil Liability, where Javier Garat addressed key aspects of the coverage, the latest market trends, and practical experiences to enrich risk management in this segment.

It was an excellent space for exchange, exploring specific cases, current challenges, and opportunities for improvement.

One more step to continue strengthening our joint work and the value we build as a team!

A big thank you to Gabriel Espinosa, Adrián Pereyra, and Claudio Gainza for welcoming us and for their active participation.
Back to index
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/350a2978-653d-d0d4-220a-b6fbc0b3466e.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/4b415e60-d028-8801-4912-3384468653bc.jpg> 	
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/pKGgCM5yzUV4xO3SXtLs8L3Nq?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/8a846343-fb33-fc22-105f-67c1bf0169ed.png> 	

A SUCCESSFUL WORKSHOP WITH HDI CHILE


Their trip was also a great opportunity to visit the historic Suez Canal and strengthen client relationships.
  
We are happy to share the success of our Legal Recovery meeting with the team at HDI Seguros Chile!

Their trip was also a great opportunity to visit the historic Suez Canal and strengthen client relationships.
  
We are happy to share the success of our Legal Recovery meeting with the team at HDI Seguros Chile!

We worked to identify key points for achieving successful recoveries in a dynamic and participatory environment. At BARBUSS, we designed an innovative learning experience, incorporating games and prizes that promoted interaction, engagement, and collaboration among all attendees.

It was a space where teamwork and the exchange of knowledge were the main protagonists.

Excellent teamwork!
Back to index

 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/abe35cda-7662-56ae-a53c-9b906c88a7c0.png>

 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/a495e7b5-2039-7eac-3fdc-5306d5d70ae9.png> 	
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/jHDyCN5zAU5mVl3IXuGsy_7D7?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/11c9314c-6cd5-6e8e-6d3d-5cd3cb6400ee.png> 	

CONNECTING WITH CLIENTS IN MEXICO

 
At BARBUSS Mexico, we wrapped up a very productive week, connecting with our clients and prospects during our regional director's visit. It was a great opportunity to discuss their specific needs in subrogation.

At BARBUSS Mexico, we wrapped up a very productive week, connecting with our clients and prospects during our regional director's visit. It was a great opportunity to discuss their specific needs in subrogation.

A huge thank you to the teams at Liberty Mutual, Sura, Everest, Odyssey RE, Berkley, Lockton, and Seguros Atlas for their excellent reception and the very productive conversations.

These valuable discussions allowed us to explore new and exciting opportunities and to highlight how our innovative solutions can transform the risk industry.
 
Back to index
